hymn.title: S-T-E-A-D-F-A-S-T
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—Being Steadfast

layout.singingstanza: Oh, I am S. Oh, I am S -- T. Oh, I am S -- T -- E -- A -- D -- F -- A -- S -- T! Oh, I press on to -- ward the goal. I nev -- er waiv -- er to and fro. Oh, I am S -- T -- E -- A -- D -- F -- A -- S -- T! Oh, I am stead -- fast! Oh, yes, I'm stead -- fast! Oh, I am S -- T -- E -- A -- D -- F -- A -- S -- T! And though I have so much to do, I just press on un -- til I'm through— Oh, I am S -- T -- E -- A -- D -- F -- A -- S -- T!

lyrics.stanza: Oh, I am S. Oh, I am S - T. Oh, I am S - T - E - A - D - F - A - S - T! Oh, I press on toward the goal. I never waiver to and fro. Oh, I am S - T - E - A - D - F - A - S - T! Oh, I am steadfast! Oh, yes, I'm steadfast! Oh, I am S - T - E - A - D - F - A - S - T! And though I have so much to do, I just press on until I'm through— Oh, I am S - T - E - A - D - F - A - S - T!
